price: ߥߟߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߡߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߞߋߟߊ ߟߐ߲߫ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߴߊ߬ ߡߊߛߐ߬ߛߐ߬ ߟߊ߫؟
arabic: أَمۡ لَمۡ يَعۡرِفُواْ رَسُولَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: am lam yaʿrifū rasūlahum fahum lahu munkirūna
